explains: v. （使）枯萎，（使）干枯；衰弱，逐渐消失；使感到愚蠢，使感到羞愧；（人的四肢、皮肤等）变枯槁，萎缩

sentences.en: In autumn the leaves wither and fall off the trees.
sentences.cn: 秋天，树叶枯萎并从树上落下来。

sentences.en: During months without water under a harsh sun, they wither, shrink and contract until they look like a pile of dead gray leaves.
sentences.cn: 在没有水的几个月里，在强烈的阳光下，它们会枯萎、收缩、萎缩，直到它们看起来像一堆枯死的灰色叶子。

sentences.en: To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentences.cn: 看着我的身体在自己的眼前日渐虚弱真是让人恼火。
